bioconda.name: bioconductor-cn.mops
bioconda.summary: cn.mops - Mixture of Poissons for CNV detection in NGS data

biotools.summary: Copy Number estimation by a Mixture Of PoissonS is a data processing pipeline for copy number variations and aberrations (CNVs and CNAs) from NGS data. It supplies functions to convert BAM files into read count matrices or genomic ranges objects, and models the depths of coverage across samples at each genomic position. Therefore, it does not suffer from read count biases along chromosomes.
